title: It’s 2024. Trump Backers Won’t Certify the Election. What Next, Legally?
description: The question is most urgent in Arizona, where two of the former president’s loyalists may well become governor and secretary of state.
dc:creator: Blake Hounshell
media:credit: Adriana Zehbrauskas for The New York Times
media:description: A Trump supporter outside the Arizona State Capitol in Phoenix in 2020, when the state became a hotbed of conspiracy theories about the presidential election.
